selection.title: High Card
selection.description: Place 3 cards on the table each player picks a card

selection.title: House
selection.description: Players will need to get something from their house and bring it back

selection.title: Bottle flip
selection.description: First to flip a bottle with water in successfully

selection.title: Food face race
selection.description: First one to place an item of food on their forehead and eat it without using your hands or the item falling off their face.

selection.title: Toliet roll mayhem
selection.description: First to unroll and roll back up a roll of toliet paper.

selection.title: Draw Something
selection.description: Each player will sketch something out, there team will have to guess what it is. Fastest wins.

selection.title: Sing it
selection.description: Head to head contender has to sing a song which their team will have to guess the song and artist.

selection.title: Alliteration
selection.description: Players will be given a letter and will need to give a celebrity/Character name which the first letter of their first name and surname match - Mike Myers - Mickey Mouse.

selection.title: Disco
selection.description: head to head, Caller picks the best contender dancer.

selection.title: Costume change
selection.description: head to head, first back after a full costume change wins.

selection.title: Tea bag toss
selection.description: First to throw a tea bag into a mug from a "social distance" away.

selection.title: Selfie search
selection.description: first to show the last selfie they took on their phone.

selection.title: Couple duet
selection.description: Sing a duet together, best couple wins. Caller picks the winner.

selection.title: Best impression
selection.description: Best impression of this thing wins
items: A blind person in a brothel
Winning the lottery with an out of date ticket
